AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key ID for AWS Simple Email Service

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret access key for AWS Simple Email Service

AWS_SES_REGION.description: Region AWS Simple Email Service is setup on

AWS_S3_REGION.description: Region AWS Simple Storage is setup on

AWS_PIN_POINT_REGION.description: Region AWS Pinpoint is setup on

EMAIL_FROM_EMAIL.description: Email address used for sending emails (You will receive a verification email here)

GOOGLE_CREDENTIALS.description: Create project in Google console, setup OAuth consent screen, add Google Calendar API, and download credentials.json and place value here (add oauth redirect_uris)

JWT_TOKEN_KEY.description: Secure key for generating JWT tokens (https://www.lastpass.com/password-generator)

JWT_TOKEN_EXPIRE_SEC.description: Time until a user must login again due to inactive session (default is 1 week)

VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Run: web-push generate-vapid-keys (Used for web push notifications)

VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Run: web-push generate-vapid-keys (Used for web push notifications)
